Monologue.Current: Др. Кадоваки{Line}“Как ты себя чувствуешь?”{Line}(Нормально...){Line}(Морда болит...)
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“How are you feeling?”{Line}(Ok, I guess){Line}(My forehead hurts)

Monologue.Current: “Нормально...”
Др. Кадоваки{Line}“В следующий раз{Line} будь аккуратнее.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Take it easy next time, you hear?”

Monologue.Current: “Морда болит...”
Monologue.Original: “...My forehead hurts.”

Monologue.Current: Др. Кадоваки{Line}“Не шути так.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“No kidding.”

Monologue.Current: Др. Кадоваки{Line}“Похоже, твой взгляд сфокусировался.”{Next}“Ты скоро поправишься.{Line} Скажи-ка мне своё имя?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Looks like your eyes are focusing.”{Next}“You should be fine.{Line} Say your name for me.”

Monologue.Current: Др. Кадоваки{Line}“Посмотрим, твой инструктор...”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Let’s see, your instructor is...”

Monologue.Current: Др. Кадоваки{Line}“{Char Quistis}!{Line} Я сейчас ей позвоню.{Line} Полежи минутку.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Quistis!{Line} I’ll call her now. Just wait here a minute.”

Monologue.Current: Др. Кадоваки{Line}“{Char Quistis}?{Line} Забирайте вашего студента.”{Next}“Да, да...”{Next}“Рана не серьёзная...{Line} Но останется шрам.”{Next}“Верно.{Line} Подойдите сюда, пожалуйста.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Quistis?{Line} Come get your student.”{Next}“Yes, yes...”{Next}“His injury’s not serious.{Line} It’ll probably leave a scar.”{Next}“......Right.{Line} Now please come by.”

Monologue.Current: Др. Кадоваки{Line}“Может, не стоит так усердствовать{Line} на тренировках? В следующий раз{Line} тебе может и не повезти.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Why don’t you take it easy in training?{Line} Next time you might not be so lucky.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Скажите это {Char Seifer}у.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Tell that to Seifer.”

Monologue.Current: Др. Кадоваки{Line}“Опять {Char Seifer}...”{Next}“А просто игнорировать{Line} его ты не можешь?”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“That Seifer...{Line} Won’t listen to anyone.”{Next}“Why don’t you ignore him?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Не буду же я от него убегать!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I can’t just run away.”

Monologue.Current: Др. Кадоваки{Line}“Хочешь быть крутым?..{Line} Ну, валяй... И голову береги.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“You wanna be cool, huh?{Line} Well, don’t get hurt in the process.”

Monologue.Current: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Just rest until{Line} Instructor Trepe gets here.”
Monologue.Original: Dr. Kadowaki{Line}“Just rest until{Line} Instructor Trepe gets here.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Так и знала, что этим закончится!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I knew it’d be either{Line} you or Seifer!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Вставай, герой.{Line} У тебя сегодня экзамен.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Come on, let’s go.{Line} Today’s the field exam.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You all see me in such{Line} an embarassing state.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You all see me in such{Line} an embarassing state.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, can you hear me?”{Next}“Head to {Color Blue}〖Edea’s House〗{Color White}{Line} at once.”{Next}“The Sorceress Edea... Matron{Line} is back at the orphanage.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}, can you hear me?”{Next}“Head to {Color Blue}〖Edea’s House〗{Color White}{Line} at once.”{Next}“The Sorceress Edea... Matron{Line} is back at the orphanage.”

Monologue.Current: ({Char Rinoa}...You feel so cold.)
Monologue.Original: ({Char Rinoa}...You feel so cold.)

Monologue.Current: (Are you going to be like this forever?)
Monologue.Original: (Are you going to be like this forever?)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“......”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“......”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Isn’t there anything I can do!?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Isn’t there anything I can do!?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“You were so full of life.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“You were so full of life.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Now you don’t even make a sound...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Now you don’t even make a sound...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I want to hear your voice.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I want to hear your voice.”

Monologue.Current: (This is like talking to a wall.)
Monologue.Original: (This is like talking to a wall.)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“{Char Rinoa}... Call my name.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“{Char Rinoa}... Call my name.”

Monologue.Current: (I want to hear {Char Rinoa}’s voice.)
Monologue.Original: (I want to hear {Char Rinoa}’s voice.)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I can see you if we go back in time!{Line} Maybe even change things!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I can see you if we go back in time!{Line} Maybe even change things!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Ellone!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Ellone!”

Monologue.Current: “Ellone! Can you hear me!?”
Monologue.Original: “Ellone! Can you hear me!?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Send me back to the moment{Line} {Char Rinoa} went into a coma!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Send me back to the moment{Line} {Char Rinoa} went into a coma!”

Monologue.Current: (Ellone, you won’t answer me...?){Line}(I know she’s on the White SeeD ship.){Next}(White SeeD... Edea’s SeeD...{Line} Edea’s SeeD?)
Monologue.Original: (Ellone, you won’t answer me...?){Line}(I know she’s on the White SeeD ship.){Next}(White SeeD... Edea’s SeeD...{Line} Edea’s SeeD?)

Monologue.Current: “Maybe Edea would know the{Line} whereabouts of the ship!”
Monologue.Original: “Maybe Edea would know the{Line} whereabouts of the ship!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Then I can see Ellone.{Line} Then maybe I can go back...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Then I can see Ellone.{Line} Then maybe I can go back...”

Monologue.Current: (Let’s go, {Char Rinoa}.{Line} Let’s go meet Ellone.)
Monologue.Original: (Let’s go, {Char Rinoa}.{Line} Let’s go meet Ellone.)

Monologue.Current: (Ellone will bring us together.)
Monologue.Original: (Ellone will bring us together.)

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“What shall we talk about?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“What shall we talk about?”

Monologue.Current: (I want to make a report){Line}(The real meaning of SeeD){Line}(About Sorceress Edea){Line}(About Master NORG){Line}(About what to do next)
Monologue.Original: (I want to make a report){Line}(The real meaning of SeeD){Line}(About Sorceress Edea){Line}(About Master NORG){Line}(About what to do next)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I want to make a report.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I want to make a report.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“No, no.{Line} It’s not necessary.”{Next}“I can guess what must’ve{Line} happened.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“No, no.{Line} It’s not necessary.”{Next}“I can guess what must’ve{Line} happened.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Please tell me the real{Line} meaning of SeeD.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Please tell me the real{Line} meaning of SeeD.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“SeeD is SeeD. The elite{Line} mercenary force of {Term Balamb} Garden.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“SeeD is SeeD. The elite{Line} mercenary force of {Term Balamb} Garden.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Hmmm, do you know{Line} something about SeeD?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Hmmm, do you know{Line} something about SeeD?”

Monologue.Current: (I never know anything.)
Monologue.Original: (I never know anything.)

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“SeeD will defeat the sorceress.{Line} The Garden will train SeeD members.”{Next}“The many missions around the world{Line} are only training for the final{Line} battle against the sorceress.”{Next}“But now that the sorceress has become a{Line} major threat, our true mission{Line} has begun.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“SeeD will defeat the sorceress.{Line} The Garden will train SeeD members.”{Next}“The many missions around the world{Line} are only training for the final{Line} battle against the sorceress.”{Next}“But now that the sorceress has become a{Line} major threat, our true mission{Line} has begun.”

Monologue.Current: (SeeD will defeat the sorceress...)
Monologue.Original: (SeeD will defeat the sorceress...)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Please tell me about Sorceress Edea.{Line} I heard she’s your wife.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Please tell me about Sorceress Edea.{Line} I heard she’s your wife.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You’re quite right...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You’re quite right...”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“She had been a sorceress since childhood.{Line} I married her, knowing that.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“She had been a sorceress since childhood.{Line} I married her, knowing that.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We were happy.{Line} We worked together, the two of us.{Line} We were very happy.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We were happy.{Line} We worked together, the two of us.{Line} We were very happy.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“One day, Edea began talking about{Line} building the Garden and training SeeD.”{Next}“I became obsessed with that plan. But{Line} I was very concerned with SeeD’s goal,{Line} that one day SeeD might fight Edea...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“One day, Edea began talking about{Line} building the Garden and training SeeD.”{Next}“I became obsessed with that plan. But{Line} I was very concerned with SeeD’s goal,{Line} that one day SeeD might fight Edea...”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“She laughed and told me{Line} that would never happen.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“She laughed and told me{Line} that would never happen.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“However...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“However...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Tell me about{Line} Master NORG.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Tell me about{Line} Master NORG.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“He is from the Shumi tribe.{Line} A black sheep of the tribe, one might say.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“He is from the Shumi tribe.{Line} A black sheep of the tribe, one might say.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We met while I was running around{Line} trying to find funds to build the Garden.”{Next}“He became interested in building{Line} the Garden, and we hit it off.{Line} Thanks to his funding, it was completed.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We met while I was running around{Line} trying to find funds to build the Garden.”{Next}“He became interested in building{Line} the Garden, and we hit it off.{Line} Thanks to his funding, it was completed.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“However, we needed an enormous{Line} amount of funds to run the Garden.”{Next}“So we began dispatching SeeDs{Line} around the world as a means{Line} of supporting the Garden.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“However, we needed an enormous{Line} amount of funds to run the Garden.”{Next}“So we began dispatching SeeDs{Line} around the world as a means{Line} of supporting the Garden.”

Monologue.Current: “I was against dispatching SeeDs around{Line} the world.”{Next}“But considering our goal, NORG was{Line} right to point out that training{Line} wouldn’t be enough.”{Next}“We also had to think about students{Line} who decided not to become SeeDs.{Line} ......We needed money.”
Monologue.Original: “I was against dispatching SeeDs around{Line} the world.”{Next}“But considering our goal, NORG was{Line} right to point out that training{Line} wouldn’t be enough.”{Next}“We also had to think about students{Line} who decided not to become SeeDs.{Line} ......We needed money.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“NORG’s idea was{Line} right on the money.”{Next}“An enormous amount of capital{Line} began flowing into the Garden.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“NORG’s idea was{Line} right on the money.”{Next}“An enormous amount of capital{Line} began flowing into the Garden.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“And the Garden began to change.”{Next}“Lost sight of our high ideals,{Line} the truth was covered up...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“And the Garden began to change.”{Next}“Lost sight of our high ideals,{Line} the truth was covered up...”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“That’s probably enough.”{Next}“In the end, it was my fault,{Line} for giving up control.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“That’s probably enough.”{Next}“In the end, it was my fault,{Line} for giving up control.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“What do we do now?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“What do we do now?”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We must stop{Line} drifting around soon...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We must stop{Line} drifting around soon...”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I only hope that we can get things{Line} back to the way they were.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“I only hope that we can get things{Line} back to the way they were.”
